title: Classic
review: It is a classic movie. I thought it would be boring, but I had to watch it, no chance.My impression was really different. Other time, it is a classic movie, but is a perfect movie too. Excellent music (BSO),script, edition, photography...Classic scenes, you cannot lost it.The movie describes the final of the II World War, with a refuge in Casablanca (Morocco), where people that wants to escape form the regimen go to get a passport.There, Rick meets an old girlfriend, and the classic scenes appears.As time goes by...
